SUB_W15_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_00.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W15_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_00.text:
Yeesh, what is that terrible SMELL!?
Is it because of the smoke coming 
from those buildings over there?

SUB_W15_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_01.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W15_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_01.text:
Not the liveliest city I've
ever seen, that's for sure.

SUB_W15_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_01.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W15_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_01.text:
Oh, look! It's the Vermillion Bird!
...Wait, no. Just a shape in the smoke.

SUB_W15_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_02.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W15_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_02.text:
That sounded like an explosion!
Where'd it come from?

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_TERMINAL_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: CEO_TRIGON
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_TERMINAL_000_CUT_000_0.text:
Another accident? Well, great. I suppose this
is going to postpone the beginning of service
yet again. What is our useless pack of engineers
even doing!?

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_TERMINAL_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: CEO_TRIGON
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_TERMINAL_000_CUT_000_0.text:
You there! What are you staring into
space for? Hurry up and deal with this!

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_TERMINAL_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Fred_Kinlei
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_TERMINAL_000_CUT_000_0.text:
I'll see it taken care of, Director.
I've already called Corana.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_TERMINAL_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: CEO_TRIGON
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_TERMINAL_000_CUT_000_0.text:
There's going to be no end to trouble if you
don't sort this out, Fred. Dealing with the
Anti-Triangle is already enough of a headache—
we don't need more issues in our lives.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_TERMINAL_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: CEO_TRIGON
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_TERMINAL_000_CUT_000_0.text:
And remember this: the Trigon Corporation
has no seats at the table for those who prove
themselves of no use.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_TERMINAL_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Fred_Kinlei
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_TERMINAL_000_CUT_000_0.text:
Sorry about that, friend. The director's been
on edge lately, what with the accidents at
the triangle engines and the appearance
of the Anti-Triangle.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_TERMINAL_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_TERMINAL_000_CUT_000_0.text:
If you hoped I would follow that,
you're gonna be disappointed.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_TERMINAL_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Fred_Kinlei
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_TERMINAL_000_CUT_000_0.text:
Ah, I see. You've clearly come to
us from somewhere far away.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_TERMINAL_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Fred_Kinlei
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_TERMINAL_000_CUT_000_0.text:
Well then, let me give you the rundown.
Every single machine we have is powered
by something called a 'triangle engine.' These engines are based on a concept
called 'triangle theory,' and require
no fuel of any kind.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_TERMINAL_000_CUT_000_1.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_TERMINAL_000_CUT_000_1.text:
I don't know about this theory you've got,
but I assume the gist is that it's like a
magical circuit that uses triangles?
Also, what's this 'Anti-Triangle' stuff?

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_TERMINAL_000_CUT_000_1.speaker: Fred_Kinlei
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_TERMINAL_000_CUT_000_1.text:
The term 'Anti-Triangle' is a general
word we use to describe the fiends
that have started to crop up near
our triangle engines of late. Our current working theory is that these fiends
are attracted to the force fields that surround
the engines, but honestly, the phenomenon isn't
particularly well understood yet.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_TERMINAL_000_CUT_000_1.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_TERMINAL_000_CUT_000_1.text:
Oh, fiends always gather in places where
magic is generated. They're drawn to it.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_TERMINAL_000_CUT_000_1.speaker: Fred_Kinlei
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_TERMINAL_000_CUT_000_1.text:
A fascinating theory! Are you a scholar?
I'm sure she'd be interested to—

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_TERMINAL_000_CUT_000_1.speaker: Corana_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_TERMINAL_000_CUT_000_1.text:
I hear we had another accident
with the triangle engines.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_TERMINAL_000_CUT_000_1.speaker: Fred_Kinlei
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_TERMINAL_000_CUT_000_1.text:
Oh, Corana! Great. Now that you're here,
I'll let you sort the situation out.
Work with this woman here to repair the
triangle engines, please and thank you.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_TERMINAL_000_CUT_000_1.speaker: Corana_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_TERMINAL_000_CUT_000_1.text:
All right. Come on, you—we'll start by
making some emergency repairs to the
central terminal.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_TERMINAL_000_CUT_000_1.speaker: BX10_EX

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_TERMINAL_000_CUT_010_0.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_TERMINAL_000_CUT_010_0.text:
Emergency repairs are finished.
Things should function without
issue once more after we restore
the entire triangle network.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_TERMINAL_000_CUT_010_0.speaker: Corana_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_TERMINAL_000_CUT_010_0.text:
As the new model of triangle engine
is rather lacking in countermeasures,
sudden loads tend to cause accidents. Also, I've yelled at the Trigon board about
this until I'm blue in the face, but do
they listen to me? Nooo!

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_TERMINAL_000_CUT_010_0.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_TERMINAL_000_CUT_010_0.text:
Wish I could help you, but this
is all a bit out of my league.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_TERMINAL_000_CUT_010_0.speaker: Corana_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_TERMINAL_000_CUT_010_0.text:
Yes, I suppose. It's just so frustrating!
The director never listens to a word I say,
telling Fred is pointless, and you...
Well, you happen to be standing here.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_TERMINAL_000_CUT_010_0.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_TERMINAL_000_CUT_010_0.text:
There is no time for idle chatter.
We must proceed to the next location.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_TERMINAL_000_CUT_010_0.speaker: Corana_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_TERMINAL_000_CUT_010_0.text:
Of course, Master. We'll head to the
triangle engine at the tower at once.
Come along, you!

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_TOWER_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_TOWER_000_CUT_000_000.text:
Is that fiend there part of that
'Anti-Triangle' you mentioned?

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_TOWER_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Corana_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_TOWER_000_CUT_000_010.text:
You don't know about the Anti-Triangle?
Are you a new hire or something?

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_TOWER_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_TOWER_000_CUT_000_020.text:
I'm not a new hire, I'm a 'no' hire!
I don't work for your company at all! I was just passing by, but then that director
lady thought I looked like an employee and
that Fred guy started bossing me around,
and now I'm here with you repairing stuff.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_TOWER_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: Corana_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_TOWER_000_CUT_000_030.text:
Oh? Hmm. Sorry about that; I thought you
were a Trigon Corporation employee. Still,
that doesn't explain why Fred had you come.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_TOWER_000_CUT_000_040.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_TOWER_000_CUT_000_040.text:
Honestly, I think Fred KNOWS I'm not an
employee. I mean, he knew right away
that I came from somewhere else.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_TOWER_000_CUT_000_050.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_TOWER_000_CUT_000_050.text:
But before we keep talking,
we should sort out these fiends!

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_TOWER_000_CUT_010_000.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_TOWER_000_CUT_010_000.text:
System reinitialization is complete,
and the restart process is underway.
We should return to normal output shortly.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_TOWER_000_CUT_010_010.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_TOWER_000_CUT_010_010.text:
So did those fiends wreck
the triangle engine?

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_TOWER_000_CUT_010_020.speaker: Corana_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_TOWER_000_CUT_010_020.text:
The Anti-Triangle doesn't attack the triangle
engines—it just steals energy from them.
But eventually it steals so much that
the engines overload and shut down.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_TOWER_000_CUT_010_030.speaker: Corana_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_TOWER_000_CUT_010_030.text:
Usually I can't count on a word Fred says,
but it looks like he wasn't wrong about my
bringing you along.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_TOWER_000_CUT_010_040.speaker: Corana_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_TOWER_000_CUT_010_040.text:
Since all the other triangle engines are
currently in shutdown mode, I need to
go around and restart them all.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_TOWER_000_CUT_010_050.speaker: Corana_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_TOWER_000_CUT_010_050.text:
I'd normally have to wait until Trigon sent out
a special team to deal with the Anti-Triangle,
but with you and Master at my side, we should
be able to proceed without issue.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_TOWER_000_CUT_010_060.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_TOWER_000_CUT_010_060.text:
I'm glad, but—and don't laugh—I actually came
here looking for a magical cat. It's a serious
situation, and I really have to find it.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_TOWER_000_CUT_010_070.speaker: Corana_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_TOWER_000_CUT_010_070.text:
Which means you'll be searching
for enchanted felines instead of
helping me?

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_TOWER_000_CUT_010_080.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_TOWER_000_CUT_010_080.text:
What? No! See, I've got a feeling the
Anti-Triangle and these triangle engines
are tied into my finding the cat somehow,
so I'm totally going to help you.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_TOWER_000_CUT_010_090.speaker: Corana_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_TOWER_000_CUT_010_090.text:
That would be wonderful, thank you.
And in return, I will do what I can
to help you.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_TOWER_000_CUT_010_100.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_TOWER_000_CUT_010_100.text:
A fine plan. Now let us head to the next site;
as soon as we have three repaired engines,
we can link them into a more efficient
tandem known as a 'triangle network.'

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_TOWER_000_CUT_010_110.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_TOWER_000_CUT_010_110.text:
Hm, okay. So between the terminal and
the tower, we just need one more place
repaired to make a triangle.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_CAVE_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_CAVE_000_CUT_000_000.text:
This place would form a triangle if it had
an engine, but it's just some dusty old cave.
Could there really be something here?

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_CAVE_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_CAVE_000_CUT_000_010.text:
Not according to the data I have on hand.
That said, the place is indeed part of
the triangle network.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_CAVE_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: Barbara
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_CAVE_000_CUT_000_020.text:
Welcome to Mural Ruins. I'm Barbara,
and I conduct research on the murals here.
I heard we had some unusual guests coming,
but didn't know Dr. Sitrix had an assistant!

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_CAVE_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_CAVE_000_CUT_000_030.text:
Heya! I'm Ameya, and I'm helping
Master fix up the triangle engines.
So what's the story with these ruins?

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_CAVE_000_CUT_000_040.speaker: Barbara
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_CAVE_000_CUT_000_040.text:
This is the place where Alessa and Corana—
the Sitrix sisters—invented triangle theory.
Supposedly they were inspired by the murals,
but that could just be a myth.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_CAVE_000_CUT_000_050.speaker: Barbara
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_CAVE_000_CUT_000_050.text:
Regardless, I'm hoping to unravel the true
meaning behind the murals by investigating
the various pieces that remain here.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_CAVE_000_CUT_000_060.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_CAVE_000_CUT_000_060.text:
I would also like to see the mural
that Dr. Corana Sitrix saw.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_CAVE_000_CUT_000_070.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_CAVE_000_CUT_000_070.text:
I'm kinda surprised you
haven't seen it already.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_CAVE_000_CUT_000_080.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_CAVE_000_CUT_000_080.text:
I was created by Dr. Alessa Sitrix based
upon the principles of triangle theory.
I know nothing of the time prior to my
initial origination.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_CAVE_000_CUT_000_090.speaker: Barbara
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_CAVE_000_CUT_000_090.text:
Oh dear. You see, that mural is located
deep inside the cave, and I am not sure
I can actually guide you there. You'll probably want to consult with Corana;
it's a complicated route, but I'm sure BX10
won't have any trouble recalling it once
she implants it in his memory.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_CAVE_000_CUT_000_110.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_CAVE_000_CUT_000_110.text:
I wish to see the place where triangle theory
was born. The reason behind this is something
more akin to human sentimentality than logic,
but either way, I feel the need to go there.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_CAVE_000_CUT_000_120.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_CAVE_000_CUT_000_120.text: Then let's head for Corana's lab!

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_CAVE_GOLAB_000_CUT_000.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_CAVE_GOLAB_000_CUT_000.text:
Hi there, Corana! I heard about the mural 
you found—the one that helped you develop
triangle theory? Master and I wanted to take a peek at it,
so I was wondering if you'd mind pointing
us in the right direction.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_CAVE_GOLAB_000_CUT_000.speaker: Corana_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_CAVE_GOLAB_000_CUT_000.text:
There are more than a few factual inaccuracies
there, but I'll let that go for now. More to the
point, however, you can't visit the mural.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_CAVE_GOLAB_000_CUT_000.speaker: Corana_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_CAVE_GOLAB_000_CUT_000.text:
No, it turned into the Vermillion Bird and
flew away. That event was the impetus for
our research into triangle theory, which posits
that arrays of triangles can produce energy.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_CAVE_GOLAB_000_CUT_000.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_CAVE_GOLAB_000_CUT_000.text:
I exist because doctors Corana and Alessa Sitrix
went into that cave, and would like to see it for
myself so I might decide whether or not it is a
truly special place.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_CAVE_GOLAB_000_CUT_000.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_CAVE_GOLAB_000_CUT_000.text: Yeah, we'd BOTH love to see it.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_CAVE_GOLAB_000_CUT_000.speaker: Corana_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_CAVE_GOLAB_000_CUT_000.text:
Very well. In that case, I will record
the location data in Master's memory
so he can guide you there.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_CAVE_END_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_CAVE_END_000_CUT_000_0.text:
Yep, we got the data we needed.
Lead the way, Master!

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_CAVE_END_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Barbara
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_CAVE_END_000_CUT_000_0.text: Do you mind if I come along?

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_CAVE_END_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_CAVE_END_000_CUT_000_0.text:
Not at all. Just take care not
to get lost along the way.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_CAVE_END_000_CUT_000_1.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_CAVE_END_000_CUT_000_1.text:
Aw, boo. The mural's gone,
just like Corana said.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_CAVE_END_000_CUT_000_1.speaker: Barbara
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_CAVE_END_000_CUT_000_1.text:
Wait, it's gone!? Why didn't you say that
BEFORE we tromped all the way here!?

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_CAVE_END_000_CUT_000_1.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_CAVE_END_000_CUT_000_1.text:
But wait, look! There's some kind
of triangular indentation.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_CAVE_END_000_CUT_000_1.speaker: Barbara
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_CAVE_END_000_CUT_000_1.text:
Ah, yes. I also see a triangular
fragment on the ground.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_CAVE_END_000_CUT_000_2.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_CAVE_END_000_CUT_000_2.text:
Though faint, I am detecting energy. 
This is a triangle engine.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_CAVE_END_000_CUT_000_2.speaker: Barbara
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_CAVE_END_000_CUT_000_2.text:
Oh, but this raises so many questions!
Did this occur naturally, or did ancient
people already know about triangle theory!?

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_DAM_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_DAM_000_CUT_000_000.text:
Does a dam even need
a triangle engine?

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_DAM_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_DAM_000_CUT_000_010.text:
The dam's hydraulic power generation
is used to make the triangle engine
more efficient. It is one of Dr. Alessa Sitrix's earliest
works—such a large-scale apparatus
would not be made today.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_DAM_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: DamMaster_Teo
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_DAM_000_CUT_000_020.text:
A'yup. And since it's so old,
maintenance is a real pain.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_DAM_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_DAM_000_CUT_000_030.text:
While the procedure to restart this engine
is not complicated, it takes a good deal of
time due to the size of the dam. As such,
I recommend we prioritize other locations.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_DAM_000_CUT_000_040.speaker: DamMaster_Teo
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_DAM_000_CUT_000_040.text:
Actually, I can handle it if you give me
the details. I mean, it IS my job as the
foreman of the dam and all.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_DAM_000_CUT_000_050.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_DAM_000_CUT_000_050.text:
Very well. Remember these steps.
First, you...

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_DAM_000_CUT_000_060.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_DAM_000_CUT_000_060.text:
...And if you repeat that sequence,
everything should work out.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_DAM_000_CUT_000_070.speaker: DamMaster_Teo
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_DAM_000_CUT_000_070.text:
Woof! That's a lot more work than I
was expecting. But I'll get 'er done,
don't you worry.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_DAM_END_000_CUT_000_00.speaker: DamMaster_Teo
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_DAM_END_000_CUT_000_00.text:
Took a while, but I finally managed
to get everything restarted.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_DAM_END_000_CUT_000_01.speaker: DamMaster_Teo
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_DAM_END_000_CUT_000_01.text:
Thanks for showing me how, by the way!
Probably a good thing for me to know.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_FOREST_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Silvano
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_FOREST_000_CUT_000_000.text:
People keep saying things are being
purified, but the pollution around here
is clearly getting WORSE, not better.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_FOREST_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Silvano
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_FOREST_000_CUT_000_010.text:
I mean, these people are all
off their nuts, right!?

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_FOREST_000_CUT_000_040.speaker: Silvano
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_FOREST_000_CUT_000_040.text:
Exactly—and that's why we need
to ACTUALLY purify things!

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_FOREST_000_CUT_000_050.speaker: Silvano
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_FOREST_000_CUT_000_050.text:
So you're on their side,
tree-hater!?

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_FOREST_000_CUT_000_060.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_FOREST_000_CUT_000_060.text:
With that man gone,
we can restart the engine.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_FOREST_010_CUT_000_010.speaker: Silvano
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_FOREST_010_CUT_000_010.text:
Today we're gonna do some
REAL purification!

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_FOREST_010_CUT_000_030.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_FOREST_010_CUT_000_030.text: Well, leave me out of it.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_INDUSTRIAL_000_CUT_000.speaker: TRIGON_Nello
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_INDUSTRIAL_000_CUT_000.text:
Goodness, but that's an unusual fashion sense
you're sporting! Got time to chat? I'd love
to pick your brain and see if it can maybe
lead to developing some new products.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_INDUSTRIAL_000_CUT_000.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_INDUSTRIAL_000_CUT_000.text:
Oh, for sure! I'm pretty
interested in fashion, myself.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_INDUSTRIAL_000_CUT_000.speaker: TRIGON_Nello
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_INDUSTRIAL_000_CUT_000.text:
Yes, your outfit is almost to die for, and yet
there's something missing. A headband, perhaps?
Earrings? A necklace? Eureka! It's a WATCH!

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_INDUSTRIAL_000_CUT_000.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_INDUSTRIAL_000_CUT_000.text:
A watch? Like, a thing to see the time?
Witches don't really need gear like that,
but if it looks cute, I'm totally willing
to strap it on and see.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_INDUSTRIAL_000_CUT_000.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_INDUSTRIAL_000_CUT_000.text:
Does the Trigon Corporation even have the
technology to develop a triangle engine
small enough to be worn on the wrist?

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_INDUSTRIAL_000_CUT_000.speaker: TRIGON_Nello
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_INDUSTRIAL_000_CUT_000.text:
Don't underestimate us! Why, your circuits
would be scrambled if you saw what was
going on at the company's R&D facility!

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_INDUSTRIAL_GOTOWER_000.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_INDUSTRIAL_GOTOWER_000.text:
Hrm. This thing's big and clunky
and not cute at ALL.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_INDUSTRIAL_GOTOWER_000.speaker: TRIGON_Nello
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_INDUSTRIAL_GOTOWER_000.text:
Director! I'm working on a prototype that
utilizes a small-scale triangle engine,
but it appears it's still too large.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_INDUSTRIAL_GOTOWER_000.speaker: CEO_TRIGON
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_INDUSTRIAL_GOTOWER_000.text:
The miniaturized triangle engine is a nut
countless individuals before you have
tried and failed to crack.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_INDUSTRIAL_GOTOWER_000.speaker: CEO_TRIGON
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_INDUSTRIAL_GOTOWER_000.text:
We need more practical product concepts.
Try asking for Fred's opinion.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_INDUSTRIAL_GOTERMINAL_.speaker: TRIGON_Nello
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_INDUSTRIAL_GOTERMINAL_.text:
Say there, Fred! So I'm trying to develop a
wristwatch that utilizes a miniature triangle
engine, but I just can't seem to get the thing
small enough. Do you have any ideas?

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_INDUSTRIAL_GOTERMINAL_.speaker: Fred_Kinlei
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_INDUSTRIAL_GOTERMINAL_.text:
Miniaturizing a triangle engine is something
best left to pure geniuses like Alessa.
Sadly, she was never interested in that
kind of research.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_INDUSTRIAL_GOTERMINAL_.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_INDUSTRIAL_GOTERMINAL_.text:
Agreed. Dr. Alessa Sitrix's research interests
shifted away from improving the triangle engine
itself and toward the development of the
BX series—which concluded with me.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_INDUSTRIAL_GOTERMINAL_.speaker: Fred_Kinlei
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_INDUSTRIAL_GOTERMINAL_.text:
She doesn't much care about machines.
In the end, Alessa thinks about Alessa,
and that's it.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_INDUSTRIAL_GOTERMINAL_.speaker: Fred_Kinlei
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_INDUSTRIAL_GOTERMINAL_.text:
Oh, sorry. Did it sound like that?
No, I'm afraid Alessa has passed on.
I was speaking of things in the past.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_INDUSTRIAL_GOTERMINAL_.speaker: Fred_Kinlei
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_INDUSTRIAL_GOTERMINAL_.text:
Oh, and this is merely a thought,
but what if you pursued an air purifier
instead of this wristwatch?

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_INDUSTRIAL_GOTERMINAL_.speaker: Fred_Kinlei
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_INDUSTRIAL_GOTERMINAL_.text:
The technological capabilities of the Trigon
Corporation allow us to manufacture large-
scale products with ease, you see. And if we develop products that are meant
for factories and not individuals, we can
sell them at an even higher price.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_INDUSTRIAL_GOTERMINAL_.speaker: TRIGON_Nello
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_INDUSTRIAL_GOTERMINAL_.text:
Ah, I see! So rather than trying to force the
miniaturization work, I should make use of our
existing technology on products that need it!
I think I've seen the light as an engineer.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_INDUSTRIAL_GOTERMINAL_.speaker: Fred_Kinlei
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_INDUSTRIAL_GOTERMINAL_.text:
Great. Then go work hard so you
can earn the director's approval.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_INDUSTRIAL_END_000_CUT.speaker: TRIGON_Nello
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_INDUSTRIAL_END_000_CUT.text:
Thanks to you, we sold
a ton of air purifiers!

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_INDUSTRIAL_END_000_CUT.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_INDUSTRIAL_END_000_CUT.text:
And by installing them in this area,
the triangle network has been restored.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_INDUSTRIAL_010_CUT_000.speaker: TRIGON_Nello
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_INDUSTRIAL_010_CUT_000.text:
I've heard from my colleagues in the
Residential and Commercial Wards,
and we're going to purify this area!

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_LAB_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Corana_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_LAB_000_CUT_000_000.text:
It appears the triangle network repairs
are proceeding smoothly. Thank you.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_LAB_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: Corana_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_LAB_000_CUT_000_020.text:
The emergence of the Anti-Triangle...
The severing of the triangle network...
The failure of triangle engines... My sister and I battled these problems
since we first came up with triangle
theory, but its value to the world
has been worth any amount of pain. Or at least, that is very much
what I want to believe...

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_LAB_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_LAB_000_CUT_000_030.text:
You seem really worn out by all this.
Can't your sister help you?

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_LAB_000_CUT_000_040.speaker: Corana_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_LAB_000_CUT_000_040.text:
...Alessa passed away in an accident
some ten years ago.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_LAB_000_CUT_000_050.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_LAB_000_CUT_000_050.text: Oh, I'm so sorry. I didn't realize.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_LAB_000_CUT_000_060.speaker: Corana_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_LAB_000_CUT_000_060.text:
There's no need to apologize; honestly,
I still have a hard time believing it.
I keep thinking she'll show up one day—
she did always love her little pranks.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_LAB_000_CUT_000_070.speaker: Corana_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_LAB_000_CUT_000_070.text:
It doesn't help that the details of her
accident are maddeningly unclear. In fact,
the only witness was Fred, who was her
assistant at the time. Alessa's old laboratory is still in the
basement of the terminal, but not even
I am allowed in there.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_LAB_000_CUT_000_080.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_LAB_000_CUT_000_080.text: Speaking of Fred, what's his deal?

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_LAB_000_CUT_000_090.speaker: Corana_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_LAB_000_CUT_000_090.text:
You'd have to ask him about that.
For now, you can leave the triangle
engine in this place to me.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_LAB_000_CUT_000_110.speaker: Corana_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_LAB_000_CUT_000_110.text:
I should probably mention this: Fred and I
were once...together. So if I seem reluctant
to discuss the man, that's why.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_LAB_GOTERMINAL_000_CUT.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_LAB_GOTERMINAL_000_CUT.text:
Hiya, Fred! I heard that you used to be
Alessa's assistant. Mind telling me more
about what she was researching?

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_LAB_GOTERMINAL_000_CUT.speaker: Fred_Kinlei
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_LAB_GOTERMINAL_000_CUT.text:
I was her assistant when she was researching
the BX series—the results of which are
standing next to you now. We wanted to apply triangle theory to AI.
Alessa had grown dissatisfied researching
triangle engines, you see, and sought to
use the theory with different applications.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_LAB_GOTERMINAL_000_CUT.speaker: Fred_Kinlei
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_LAB_GOTERMINAL_000_CUT.text:
Honestly, Alessa was just quick to lose interest
in things. Once a subject started going well,
she'd drop it like a hot potato and move on to
something new and exciting. Gave me a bit of whiplash as her assistant,
but that was nothing compared to the messes
her sister Corana had to clean up.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_LAB_GOTERMINAL_000_CUT.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_LAB_GOTERMINAL_000_CUT.text:
Was that around the time
of her accident?

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_LAB_GOTERMINAL_000_CUT.speaker: Fred_Kinlei
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_LAB_GOTERMINAL_000_CUT.text:
That has nothing to do with you.
Why are you even asking?

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_LAB_GOTERMINAL_000_CUT.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_LAB_GOTERMINAL_000_CUT.text:
Well, I heard she might actually still
be alive, and thought you might know
something about it.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_LAB_GOTERMINAL_000_CUT.speaker: Fred_Kinlei
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_LAB_GOTERMINAL_000_CUT.text:
Ugh. This conversation is dredging up some
things I would much sooner forget. She was
so horribly disfigured in that accident,
and I just... I can't...

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_LAB_GOTERMINAL_000_CUT.speaker: Fred_Kinlei
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_LAB_GOTERMINAL_000_CUT.text:
I'm sorry, but my inability to handle this
is why I broke up with Corana, and I really
have no interest in discussing it further.
I'll take my leave now.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_LAB_GOTERMINAL_000_CUT.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_LAB_GOTERMINAL_000_CUT.text:
If you ask me, Master, that guy is hiding
something—although it DOES seem like the
accident really happened.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_LAB_GOTERMINAL_000_CUT.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_LAB_GOTERMINAL_000_CUT.text:
I am not capable of such intuitive judgments.
So long as the cause and details of the
accident remain unknown, Dr. Alessa Sitrix's
death cannot be confirmed conclusively. My analysis of our conversation just now
also supports that assessment.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_LAB_GOTERMINAL_000_CUT.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_LAB_GOTERMINAL_000_CUT.text:
Well, we should probably wait to talk to
Corana about it again, 'cause she REALLY
wants her sister to still be alive. It would be cruel to get her hopes up
only to dash 'em again, you know?

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_LAB_END_000_CUT_000_00.speaker: Corana_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_LAB_END_000_CUT_000_00.text:
I've finished repairing the laboratory's
triangle engine. Now tell me, how did
your conversation with Fred go?

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_LAB_END_000_CUT_000_01.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_LAB_END_000_CUT_000_01.text:
I couldn't get a good read on what kind
of person he is, but I definitely think
he's hiding something.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_LAB_END_000_CUT_000_02.speaker: Corana_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_LAB_END_000_CUT_000_02.text:
Then you and I have arrived
at the same conclusion. Honestly, I felt that way even when we lived
together. Though we were partners, I never
once felt love for the man. It was more like...
Well, like I had to comfort him in Alessa's stead.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_LAB_END_000_CUT_000_04.speaker: Corana_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_LAB_END_000_CUT_000_04.text:
...Forgive me. It's water under the bridge.
There are things that need doing in the here
and now, and that's what I should attend to.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_LAB_020_CUT_000_000.speaker: Corana_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_LAB_020_CUT_000_000.text:
The triangle network restoration seems
to be proceeding apace; the skies look
that much prettier.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_LAB_020_CUT_000_010.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_LAB_020_CUT_000_010.text:
I wanted to ask about that, actually.
Is the source of that awful smell all
the smoke from the triangle engines?
'Cause it's a major downer.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_LAB_020_CUT_000_020.speaker: Corana_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_LAB_020_CUT_000_020.text:
You're an odd one, aren't you? This 'smell,'
as you call it, is proof that life is growing
richer. Also, when I look at a sky and see
only blue, it makes me profoundly uneasy. Just look at all that smog! Doesn't it make you
feel like you're being embraced by something warm
and comforting? In this way, our engines give
not only physical happiness, but peace of mind.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_LAB_020_CUT_000_030.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_LAB_020_CUT_000_030.text:
Yeah, I still don't get it, but I've got
other things I need to talk about. I saw the Anti-Triangle recently,
and they weren't able to absorb
any triangle energy.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_LAB_020_CUT_000_040.speaker: Corana_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_LAB_020_CUT_000_040.text:
That seems rather unlikely, but I suppose
I've no choice but to believe you.
Can you give any more details?

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_LAB_020_CUT_000_050.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_LAB_020_CUT_000_050.text:
I dunno? I mean, I've seen them a lot,
and these ones didn't seem any different.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_LAB_020_CUT_000_060.speaker: Corana_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_LAB_020_CUT_000_060.text:
Well, what about the area around it?
If the Anti-Triangle itself hasn't changed,
perhaps something in the surroundings did.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_LAB_020_CUT_000_070.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_LAB_020_CUT_000_070.text:
The triangle network around the
Anti-Triangle had been restored.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_LAB_020_CUT_000_080.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_LAB_020_CUT_000_080.text:
Oh yeah! It was like no matter how hard they
tried, they just couldn't absorb energy from
the triangle engine. Eventually they just
sorta poofed out and disappeared.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_LAB_020_CUT_000_090.speaker: Corana_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_LAB_020_CUT_000_090.text:
Interesting... So if the Anti-Triangle is
caught in a triangle network, it protects
the engines and gives us an opening to
exterminate the beasts.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_LAB_020_CUT_000_100.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_LAB_020_CUT_000_100.text:
Ah, okay! So basically we should reactivate
the triangle engines in a way that encloses
the Anti-Triangle in a triangle shape?

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_LAB_020_CUT_000_110.speaker: Corana_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_LAB_020_CUT_000_110.text:
Exactly so. Oh, but this is very exciting!
Now that we understand more about the
Anti-Triangle, we might be able to prevent
it from appearing entirely.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_MINE_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_MINE_000_CUT_000_000.text:
Hi there! We'd like to take a look
at the triangle engine.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_MINE_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Teo_Senior
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_MINE_000_CUT_000_010.text:
Get outta here! If I can't use any water
from the dam, I can't get any work done!
Now go on! Beat it! Git!

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_MINE_010_CUT_000_000.speaker: Teo_Senior
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_MINE_010_CUT_000_000.text:
Seems like my son's good work has led to the
restoration of the dam's triangle engine.
What a chip off the old block! Gah ha ha!

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_MINE_010_CUT_000_010.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_MINE_010_CUT_000_010.text:
Hi there! We'd like to take a look
at the triangle engine.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_MINE_010_CUT_000_020.speaker: Teo_Senior
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_MINE_010_CUT_000_020.text:
Nope! I'm busy gettin' the thing up
and running again. Go on, now! Git!

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_MINE_010_CUT_000_030.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_MINE_010_CUT_000_030.text:
Why won't this man listen to us?
He should be concerned about the fact
his engine is no longer functioning.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_MINE_010_CUT_000_040.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_MINE_010_CUT_000_040.text:
Guessing he doesn't want anyone to steal
his thunder. But sounds like his kid's at
the dam, so let's try talking to him.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_MINE_GODAM_010_CUT_000.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_MINE_GODAM_010_CUT_000.text:
Hi there. Is your dad the guy
who runs the mine?

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_MINE_GODAM_010_CUT_000.speaker: DamMaster_Teo
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_MINE_GODAM_010_CUT_000.text:
Oh no! Is he causing you trouble?
I'm so sorry.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_MINE_GODAM_010_CUT_000.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_MINE_GODAM_010_CUT_000.text:
Uh, not exactly? We want to talk to
him about the mine's triangle engine,
but he's not really having it.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_MINE_GODAM_010_CUT_000.speaker: DamMaster_Teo
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_MINE_GODAM_010_CUT_000.text:
*sigh* I'm afraid he's always been like this.
See, my father is an incredibly competitive
man who always tries to do everything himself. This leads to a vicious circle where it
becomes harder and harder to ask for help
once he realizes he's in over his head.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_MINE_GODAM_010_CUT_000.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_MINE_GODAM_010_CUT_000.text:
Do you mind talking to him for us?
I mean, he seems super proud of you.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_MINE_GODAM_010_CUT_000.speaker: DamMaster_Teo
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_MINE_GODAM_010_CUT_000.text: Of course. I'll go there right now.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_MINE_END_010_CUT_000_0.speaker: Teo_Senior
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_MINE_END_010_CUT_000_0.text: I'm busy with work! Go on now! Git!

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_MINE_END_010_CUT_000_0.speaker: Teo_Senior
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_MINE_END_010_CUT_000_0.text:
Son! What brings you here?
That dam still purrin' right along?

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_MINE_END_010_CUT_000_0.speaker: DamMaster_Teo
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_MINE_END_010_CUT_000_0.text:
It's running great, but only because these
folks helped me repair the triangle engine—
and you should let them do the same here.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_MINE_END_010_CUT_000_0.speaker: Teo_Senior
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_MINE_END_010_CUT_000_0.text:
Help!? I don't need no gosh-durned help!
Ain't nobody know this mine better'n me!

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_MINE_END_010_CUT_000_0.speaker: DamMaster_Teo
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_MINE_END_010_CUT_000_0.text:
YOU might be fine with that, but what about all
the other people working here? If the triangle
engine isn't fixed soon, they won't be able
to support their families.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_MINE_END_010_CUT_000_0.speaker: DamMaster_Teo
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_MINE_END_010_CUT_000_0.text: Okay, fine. What if I help you instead of some stranger?

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_MINE_END_010_CUT_000_0.speaker: Teo_Senior
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_MINE_END_010_CUT_000_0.text:
Well, sure! I'd never turn down
help from m'own son.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_MINE_END_010_CUT_000_0.speaker: DamMaster_Teo
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_MINE_END_010_CUT_000_0.text:
A'yup, I think we're ready to get things
up and running here. The process is the
same as it was at the dam, right?

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_MINE_END_010_CUT_000_1.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_MINE_END_010_CUT_000_1.text:
Yes, that will work fine. The engine here
is of the same antiquated construction as
the one located at the dam.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_PARK_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_PARK_000_CUT_000_000.text:
Wooow! This place is huge, and there
are sooo many bright shiny lights!
Did you all make this with magic?
Er, I mean, with triangle engines?

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_PARK_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_PARK_000_CUT_000_010.text:
We did. Dr. Corana Sitrix is always saying
that we must also use the power of triangle
engines to delight the children.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_PARK_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_PARK_000_CUT_000_020.text:
Aw, everyone seems really happy!
Er, but also the more I look,
the more something seems off.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_PARK_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: Lara
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_PARK_000_CUT_000_030.text:
Help! Heeelp! The triangle engine
is out of control and we can't shut
down any of the rides!

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_PARK_000_CUT_000_050.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_PARK_000_CUT_000_050.text:
This is the first time something of this
nature has happened, and my database files
do not possess a clear solution. We might be able to stop it by absorbing the
triangle energy and inducing an overload on
the system, but with the triangle network
severed, we have no means to do so.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_PARK_000_CUT_000_060.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_PARK_000_CUT_000_060.text:
Except that we DO know something
that's always sucking up whatever
triangle energy it wants...

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_PARK_000_CUT_000_070.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_PARK_000_CUT_000_070.text:
So we're gonna lure the
Anti-Triangle here!

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_PARK_END_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_PARK_END_000_CUT_000_0.text:
That worked great! I guess even
the Anti-Triangle comes in handy
once in a while.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_PARK_END_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_PARK_END_000_CUT_000_0.text:
I will forward this data to Dr. Corana Sitrix.
The information regarding both the park's engine
running wild and its subsequent stabilization
should prove valuable research data.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_PARK_END_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Lara
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_PARK_END_000_CUT_000_0.text:
Oh wow, you know Dr. Sitrix? When I was a kid,
she gave me a toy that was powered by triangle
energy. That's actually the whole reason I
started working here in the first place!

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_PARK_END_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_PARK_END_000_CUT_000_0.text:
Dr. Corana Sitrix's dream is blossoming
splendidly. She really should have more
confidence in what she's doing.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_PARK_END_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_PARK_END_000_CUT_000_0.text:
Yeah, her work is really
making everyone happy.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_PORT_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_PORT_000_CUT_000_000.text:
It is good to see you again, Michele.
Would you mind if I took care of
restarting the triangle engine here?

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_PORT_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Michele

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_PORT_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_PORT_000_CUT_000_020.text:
Michele here was one of Dr. Corana Sitrix's
colleagues at the laboratory—and the one she
had the greatest number of conversations with.
Clearly she was enamored with him.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_PORT_000_CUT_000_040.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_PORT_000_CUT_000_040.text:
My analysis judged you to be the most
suitable partner for Dr. Corana Sitrix.
Why did you not act on this?

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_PORT_000_CUT_000_050.speaker: Michele
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_PORT_000_CUT_000_050.text:
Because Corana was too busy hooking up
with Fred, of all people. Why she did that
I'll never know, especially considering he
and Alessa were an item!

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_PORT_000_CUT_000_060.speaker: Michele
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_PORT_000_CUT_000_060.text: Er... Right. Sorry. Back to work.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_PORT_000_CUT_000_070.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_PORT_000_CUT_000_070.text:
You should go say hello to Dr. Corana Sitrix
once in a while, Michele; while I can help her
with this kind of work, what she truly needs
is a partner with whom she can share her life.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_PORT_000_CUT_000_080.speaker: Michele
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_PORT_000_CUT_000_080.text:
I want to, Master—I really do.
I just... Well, I can't.
Call it a human failing, I guess.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_PORT_000_CUT_000_090.speaker: Michele
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_PORT_000_CUT_000_090.text:
You're as handy as ever, Master!
We got that wrapped up in no time. I'm also really glad we got to catch up.
Er, and if you don't mind, would you
tell Corana that I'm doing all right?

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_PORT_000_CUT_000_100.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_PORT_000_CUT_000_100.text: I will be certain to do so.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_PORT_000_CUT_000_110.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_PORT_000_CUT_000_110.text:
Relationships are complicated for reals.
Those two are clearly close, but just
slightly out of sync at the moment.
And heck, maybe they always will be.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_RANCH_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: Melania
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_RANCH_000_CUT_000_020.text:
The animals have escaped!
Please help me get them back!

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_RANCH_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_RANCH_000_CUT_000_030.text:
I will take care of repairing the
triangle engine if you can help
this woman with the animals.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_RANCH_000_CUT_000_040.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_RANCH_000_CUT_000_040.text: Guess I don't really have a choice.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_RANCH_SEARCH_000_CUT_0.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_RANCH_SEARCH_000_CUT_0.text: Animal alert! Let's get you home.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_RANCH_END_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_RANCH_END_000_CUT_000_.text:
Well, we're back—and look
who we brought with us!

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_RANCH_END_000_CUT_000_.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_RANCH_END_000_CUT_000_.text:
You took enough time that I was
able to finish the repairs here.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_RANCH_END_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Melania
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_RANCH_END_000_CUT_000_.text:
I sure wish we could use triangle theory
to create a breed of animal that actually
LISTENS when you call them...

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_RANCH_END_000_CUT_000_.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_RANCH_END_000_CUT_000_.text:
Dr. Corana Sitrix feels it unethical to apply
triangle theory to living creatures.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_RANCH_END_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_RANCH_END_000_CUT_000_.text:
Yeah, and we can't go around doing whatever
you want just 'cause it makes stuff easier.
I know, because magic is the same way. Anyway, try not to let the
animals run off again, 'kay?

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_RANCH_END_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Melania
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_RANCH_END_000_CUT_000_.text: I won't. And thank you again.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_SETTLEMENT_000_CUT_000.speaker: TRIGON_Beppe
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_SETTLEMENT_000_CUT_000.text:
Hello there. I'm with the Trigon
Infrastructure Department.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_SETTLEMENT_000_CUT_000.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_SETTLEMENT_000_CUT_000.text:
Hiya! Mind if we take a look
at the triangle engine here?

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_SETTLEMENT_000_CUT_000.speaker: TRIGON_Beppe
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_SETTLEMENT_000_CUT_000.text:
Sorry, but there's a customer in the building
that houses the triangle engine, so you can't
go near it right now. They're demanding that we purge the
pollution as quickly as possible—and
between you and me, I hope it happens
soon, because they are VERY annoying.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_SETTLEMENT_000_CUT_000.speaker: TRIGON_Beppe
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_SETTLEMENT_000_CUT_000.text:
They're even saying that the end of days is
approaching because we aren't handling the
pollution correctly. Talk about a buzzkill!

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_SETTLEMENT_000_CUT_000.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_SETTLEMENT_000_CUT_000.text:
Given this information, we should
deal with other locations first.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_SETTLEMENT_010_CUT_000.speaker: TRIGON_Beppe
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_SETTLEMENT_010_CUT_000.text:
I've heard from my colleagues in the
Industrial and Commercial Wards,
and we're going to purify this area!

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_SETTLEMENT_020_CUT_000.speaker: TRIGON_Beppe
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_SETTLEMENT_020_CUT_000.text:
Hello there. I'm with the Trigon
Infrastructure Department.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_SETTLEMENT_020_CUT_000.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_SETTLEMENT_020_CUT_000.text:
Hiya! Mind if we take a look
at the triangle engine here?

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_SETTLEMENT_020_CUT_000.speaker: TRIGON_Beppe
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_SETTLEMENT_020_CUT_000.text:
Oh, are you here to repair it!?
Thank the stars!

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_SETTLEMENT_020_CUT_000.speaker: TRIGON_Beppe
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_SETTLEMENT_020_CUT_000.text:
People keep contacting us with
all these wild complaints,
and I'm just at my wits' end!

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_SETTLEMENT_020_CUT_000.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_SETTLEMENT_020_CUT_000.text: I will deal with it at once.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_TRADE_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: TRIGON_Stella
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_TRADE_000_CUT_000_000.text:
Hello! I'm with the Trigon Sales Department!
Would you like to try out one of our newest
products absolutely free of charge!?

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_TRADE_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: TRIGON_Stella
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_TRADE_000_CUT_000_010.text:
Great! First of all, this is a sensor that
utilizes triangle energy to locate
places that will boost your spirit.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_TRADE_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: TRIGON_Stella
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_TRADE_000_CUT_000_020.text:
Even the end of days is nothing to
worry about when you have this baby!

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_TRADE_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_TRADE_000_CUT_000_030.text: Oh, you KNOW I wanna try it!

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_TRADE_000_CUT_000_050.speaker: TRIGON_Stella
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_TRADE_000_CUT_000_050.text:
Thank you very much for your interest!
Aaand...here you go. I went ahead and
just turned it on for you there.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_TRADE_000_CUT_000_060.speaker: TRIGON_Stella
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_TRADE_000_CUT_000_060.text:
Oh, I hate it when people turn down
a good deal... But hey, your loss!

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_TRADE_BATTLE_000_CUT_0.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_TRADE_BATTLE_000_CUT_0.text:
So can this thing really
'boost my spirit'?

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_TRADE_BATTLE_020_CUT_0.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_TRADE_BATTLE_020_CUT_0.text:
My sensors are not picking up
anything at this location.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_TRADE_BATTLE_020_CUT_0.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_TRADE_BATTLE_020_CUT_0.text:
Well, better re-sensor 'em or whatever,
because we got fiends incoming!

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_TRADE_END_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_TRADE_END_000_CUT_000_.text:
Okay, so we went to three places
and ALL of them were dangerous?

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_TRADE_END_000_CUT_000_.speaker: TRIGON_Stella
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_TRADE_END_000_CUT_000_.text:
Yes, but you're SO much
stronger now!

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_TRADE_END_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_TRADE_END_000_CUT_000_.text:
This thing is way too dangerous
for you to be selling it.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_TRADE_END_000_CUT_000_.speaker: BX10_EX
Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_TRADE_END_000_CUT_000_.text:
You're just lucky we're the ones
who tested your stupid thingy out.
A regular person would've died!

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_TRADE_010_CUT_000_000.speaker: TRIGON_Stella
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_TRADE_010_CUT_000_000.text:
I've heard from my colleagues in the
Industrial and Residential Wards,
and we're going to purify this area!

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_RECLEAN_000_CUT_000_00.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_RECLEAN_000_CUT_000_00.text:
We've already repaired this engine,
so restarting it is a simple matter.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_ALESSAAGHOST_000_CUT_0.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_ALESSAAGHOST_000_CUT_0.text: Hey, it's Fred. Where's he going?

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_ALESSAAGHOST_000_CUT_0.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_ALESSAAGHOST_000_CUT_0.text:
He appears to be headed to the basement
level of the terminal. Perhaps he is going
to the laboratory of Dr. Alessa Sitrix
that her sister mentioned.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_ALESSAAGHOST_000_CUT_0.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_ALESSAAGHOST_000_CUT_0.text:
Hmm. Well, I want to talk to him,
so let's tag along.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_ALESSAAGHOST_000_CUT_0.speaker: Fred_Kinlei
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_ALESSAAGHOST_000_CUT_0.text:
...Yes, everything is proceeding apace.
Additionally, the woman we spoke of
before is proving to be quite useful.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_ALESSAAGHOST_000_CUT_0.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_ALESSAAGHOST_000_CUT_0.text:
He's talking to someone—and about me,
I think? Assuming I'm 'the woman.'

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_ALESSAAGHOST_000_CUT_0.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_ALESSAAGHOST_000_CUT_0.text:
There's a 50 percent probability
that the person he is speaking
to is Dr. Alessa Sitrix.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_ALESSAAGHOST_000_CUT_0.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_ALESSAAGHOST_000_CUT_0.text: Uh, I thought she was dead?

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_ALESSAAGHOST_000_CUT_0.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_ALESSAAGHOST_000_CUT_0.text:
As I said, there is only a 50 percent
probability. This is, however, an
assumption based on my analytics.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_ALESSAAGHOST_000_CUT_0.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_ALESSAAGHOST_000_CUT_0.text:
Why WOULDN'T we hide!?
We're eavesdropping on strangers!

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_ALESSAAGHOST_000_CUT_0.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_ALESSAAGHOST_000_CUT_0.text: Dr. Alessa Sitrix is not a stranger.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_ALESSAAGHOST_000_CUT_0.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_ALESSAAGHOST_000_CUT_0.text:
I thought you were only 50 percent sure!
Also, if Alessa's alive, why would she be
pretending to be...well, not?

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_ALESSAAGHOST_000_CUT_0.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_ALESSAAGHOST_000_CUT_0.text:
We should share this information
with Dr. Corana Sitrix.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_ALESSAAGHOST_000_CUT_0.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_ALESSAAGHOST_000_CUT_0.text:
Let's talk to Fred and then think about it.
50 percent is a lot of wiggle room.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_ALESSAAGHOST_010_CUT_0.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_ALESSAAGHOST_010_CUT_0.text:
Dr. Corana Sitrix is in the central
terminal. I do not know why.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_ALESSAAGHOST_010_CUT_0.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_ALESSAAGHOST_010_CUT_0.text:
Are you always tracking where she is,
Master? 'Cause that's stalker stuff.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_ALESSAAGHOST_010_CUT_0.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_ALESSAAGHOST_010_CUT_0.text:
I am Dr. Corana Sitrix's assistant;
I must always be aware of her actions.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_ALESSAAGHOST_010_CUT_0.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_ALESSAAGHOST_010_CUT_0.text: But you DON'T know where Alessa is?

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_ALESSAAGHOST_010_CUT_0.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_ALESSAAGHOST_010_CUT_0.text:
Correct. My last reading that seemingly
detected her was our first contact
since the accident.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_ALESSAAGHOST_010_CUT_0.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_ALESSAAGHOST_010_CUT_0.text:
I guess I'm happy you're also a
little confused about all this.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_ALESSAAGHOST_010_CUT_0.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_ALESSAAGHOST_010_CUT_0.text:
It's true that I lack the data to infer the truth
of the situation. However, if Dr. Corana Sitrix
has discovered something in the terminal,
we may be able to supplement said data.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_ALESSAAGHOST_010_CUT_0.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_ALESSAAGHOST_010_CUT_0.text:
You're not wrong, but if she's there
to meet someone, we probably don't
want to poke our noses into her biz.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_ALESSAAGHOST_010_CUT_0.speaker: Corana_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_ALESSAAGHOST_010_CUT_0.text:
You must let me see Alessa's laboratory,
Fred; I have to know if there are any
papers on triangle theory there.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_ALESSAAGHOST_010_CUT_0.speaker: Fred_Kinlei
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_ALESSAAGHOST_010_CUT_0.text:
This again, Corana? All remaining data has
been released to the public through the
Trigon Corporation. There's nothing there.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_ALESSAAGHOST_010_CUT_0.speaker: Corana_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_ALESSAAGHOST_010_CUT_0.text:
But you of all people know how she was:
there might be notes or writings or
seemingly random doodles that could
turn out to be a breakthrough! Other people would simply overlook
that kind of thing, but I won't.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_ALESSAAGHOST_010_CUT_0.speaker: Fred_Kinlei
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_ALESSAAGHOST_010_CUT_0.text:
Look, I know I've always come across as a kind
of idiot luddite to you genius Sitrix sisters,
but Alessa's lab is owned by the Trigon
Corporation, and I'm in charge of it.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_ALESSAAGHOST_010_CUT_0.speaker: Fred_Kinlei
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_ALESSAAGHOST_010_CUT_0.text:
So no, Corana. You can't go in.
Now turn around and go home.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_ALESSAAGHOST_010_CUT_0.speaker: Fred_Kinlei
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_ALESSAAGHOST_010_CUT_0.text:
Ugh. One of these days, she's just going to
force her way in even if it means destroying
the entrance. We really need to deal with this.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_ALESSAAGHOST_010_CUT_0.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_ALESSAAGHOST_010_CUT_0.text:
This exchange has happened many times
between the two of them, and this
instance provided no new information.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_ALESSAAGHOST_010_CUT_0.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_ALESSAAGHOST_010_CUT_0.text:
Hmm. Fred's in a big hurry to do something,
and he's also got us running around fixing
all the triangle engines.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_ALESSAAGHOST_010_CUT_0.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_ALESSAAGHOST_010_CUT_0.text:
It would seem he has some plan
we are not aware of.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_ALESSAAGHOST_020_CUT_0.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_ALESSAAGHOST_020_CUT_0.text:
Something is going on here:
the terminal's energy level is rising.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_ALESSAAGHOST_020_CUT_0.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_ALESSAAGHOST_020_CUT_0.text:
I think Fred might be having
another clandestine chat.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_ALESSAAGHOST_020_CUT_0.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_ALESSAAGHOST_020_CUT_0.text:
We should determine if it is
Dr. Alessa Sitrix.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_ALESSAAGHOST_020_CUT_0.speaker: Alessa_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_ALESSAAGHOST_020_CUT_0.text:
So the traveler of the Conjoined Worlds has
been lured in at last. I have been trying to
ascertain if you would be a friend or foe,
but see now that you are clearly the latter.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_ALESSAAGHOST_020_CUT_0.speaker: Alessa_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_ALESSAAGHOST_020_CUT_0.text:
You'll rue the day you
interfered with me!

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_ALESSAAGHOST_020_CUT_0.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_ALESSAAGHOST_020_CUT_0.text:
I guess we know who's behind
the Anti-Triangle now!

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_ALESSAAGHOST_020_CUT_0.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_ALESSAAGHOST_020_CUT_0.text:
I can't believe that purple lady was ruling
the Anti-Triangle and messing with all the
engines. Also, was that SERIOUSLY Alessa?

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_ALESSAAGHOST_020_CUT_0.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_ALESSAAGHOST_020_CUT_0.text:
We were standing RIGHT next to her!
How can you only be 50 percent sure!?
I think you're the one who need repairing...

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_ALESSAAGHOST_020_CUT_0.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_ALESSAAGHOST_020_CUT_0.text:
No. 50 percent of that woman is
Dr. Alessa Sitrix. The remaining
50 percent is something else.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_ALESSAAGHOST_020_CUT_0.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_ALESSAAGHOST_020_CUT_0.text:
Huh. Guess that explains her look.
But we can't tell this to Corana.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_ALESSAAGHOST_020_CUT_0.speaker: Fred_Kinlei
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_ALESSAAGHOST_020_CUT_0.text:
Oh. It's you two. Look, I know there's been
a lot of work recently, what with all the
various problems cropping up, but please
continue the repairs as fast as you can.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_ALESSAAGHOST_030_CUT_0.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_ALESSAAGHOST_030_CUT_0.text: Nope. We're off to the terminal.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_ALESSAAGHOST_030_CUT_0.speaker: Alessa_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_ALESSAAGHOST_030_CUT_0.text: It's been a long time, Master.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_ALESSAAGHOST_030_CUT_0.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_ALESSAAGHOST_030_CUT_0.text:
What's going on here, Alessa! Why did you
make the Anti-Triangle, and why are you
interfering with the triangle network!?

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_ALESSAAGHOST_030_CUT_0.speaker: Alessa_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_ALESSAAGHOST_030_CUT_0.text:
You think you know much, traveler,
but you know nothing. The Anti-Triangle is a natural formation
caused by triangle energy. I was merely using
them to make the true dangers of the triangle
network known to Corana.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_ALESSAAGHOST_030_CUT_0.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_ALESSAAGHOST_030_CUT_0.text:
Huh? I haven't heard anything about the
engines and network being dangerous.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_ALESSAAGHOST_030_CUT_0.speaker: Alessa_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_ALESSAAGHOST_030_CUT_0.text:
Oh, triangle theory itself is perfectly safe.
Unexpected things happen, however, when
energy is amplified through a triangle network.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_ALESSAAGHOST_030_CUT_0.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_ALESSAAGHOST_030_CUT_0.text:
Meaning this world is actually
in a ton of danger right now?

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_ALESSAAGHOST_030_CUT_0.speaker: Alessa_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_ALESSAAGHOST_030_CUT_0.text:
It is indeed—and not even I can
predict what might happen next.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_COMPLETE_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_COMPLETE_000_CUT_000_0.text:
Dr. Corana Sitrix is headed for the central
terminal, where it appears they are planning
to hold a ceremony.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_COMPLETE_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_COMPLETE_000_CUT_000_0.text:
Yes. The energy level near the
central terminal is spiking.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_COMPLETE_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_COMPLETE_000_CUT_000_0.text: Man, I just CANNOT catch a break...

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_BOSS_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_BOSS_000_CUT_000_000.text:
What's the deal with this ceremony, Corana?
Having it start the second repairs are done
seems a little hasty—or a little convenient!

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_BOSS_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Corana_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_BOSS_000_CUT_000_010.text:
The director of the Trigon Corporation
informed me about an important ceremony
I had to attend. That's all I know.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_BOSS_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: CEO_TRIGON
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_BOSS_000_CUT_000_020.text:
Greetings, ladies and gentlemen! Today is a
momentous day in our history: every triangle
engine is now functioning, which means the
triangle network is complete! Yes, this is a day of new beginnings—
not only for all of you, but also for
everyone who could not be with us today.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_BOSS_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: CEO_TRIGON
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_BOSS_000_CUT_000_030.text:
Now, let us beckon the Supreme Being unto us.
I daresay none among you will be unfamiliar
with her name...Doctor Alessa Sitrix!

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_BOSS_000_CUT_000_050.speaker: Alessa_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_BOSS_000_CUT_000_050.text:
Greetings, everyone. Let me begin with this:
I'm aware that many of you believed I was
killed in a tragic accident—and in reality,
that is not far from the truth. But thanks to the energy generated
by the triangle network, I have
been able to return to this world.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_BOSS_000_CUT_000_060.speaker: Alessa_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_BOSS_000_CUT_000_060.text:
Henceforth, I will be resuming the work that
was interrupted by my accident—the work of
applying triangle theory to living creatures. I will offer up my body as a test subject
once more. But this time, we have more than
sufficient amounts of triangle energy,
which means I cannot fail.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_BOSS_000_CUT_000_070.speaker: Alessa_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_BOSS_000_CUT_000_070.text:
In a moment, I will stand upon this stage as a
new form of life: the Supreme Being. And once
this is done, all of you will be transmuted
into triangle energy and become one with me. Please know it will be the great honor
of my life to guide you all in this.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_BOSS_000_CUT_000_080.speaker: Corana_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_BOSS_000_CUT_000_080.text:
Have you gone utterly mad, Alessa!?
That's not what triangle theory is for! What about all the times we talked about
using it to help people!? To be of service
so they could live happier lives!?

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_BOSS_000_CUT_000_090.speaker: Alessa_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_BOSS_000_CUT_000_090.text:
Oh, my dear little sister. You have my thanks
for continuing our research after the accident—
for had you and I not completed the triangle
network, I wouldn't be standing here today. But this is a happy moment, Corana!
You are about to become a part of
the Supreme Being—a part of ME.
Does this not fill you with joy?

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_BOSS_000_CUT_000_100.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_BOSS_000_CUT_000_100.text:
Uh, so is Trigon seriously
cool with this?

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_BOSS_000_CUT_000_110.speaker: CEO_TRIGON
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_BOSS_000_CUT_000_110.text:
All that the Trigon Corporation does
is for the sake of the great Alessa—
and we offer our all unto her!

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_BOSS_000_CUT_000_120.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_BOSS_000_CUT_000_120.text:
Did you know, Fred? Did you know all this
and have me fix the engines anyway?

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_BOSS_000_CUT_000_130.speaker: Fred_Kinlei
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_BOSS_000_CUT_000_130.text:
All is as Alessa foresaw, for she said
you would be the last piece of the puzzle. Oh yes! She is my goddess, and I seek
nothing more in this life than to be
of service to her!

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_BOSS_000_CUT_000_140.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_BOSS_000_CUT_000_140.text:
Alessa? A goddess? Oh, that is rich!
I mean, sure, she's got some rabid fans,
but what kind of magic does she even use?

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_BOSS_000_CUT_000_150.speaker: Alessa_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_BOSS_000_CUT_000_150.text:
I saw how you were guided by the emerald light,
traveler, and knew it would lead you here.
Thus was I assured of my destiny, for your
arrival is the key to advancing these events.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_BOSS_000_CUT_000_160.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_BOSS_000_CUT_000_160.text:
Okay, I didn't work my butt off all
this time to become a part of YOU! Corana, we need a way to cut off
the triangle network... Er, Corana?

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_BOSS_000_CUT_000_170.speaker: Corana_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_BOSS_000_CUT_000_170.text:
I wish we never saw the Vermillion Bird mural...
I wish we hadn't researched triangle theory...
I wish I'd gone on that date with Michele... I wish I'd never reached out to Fred...
I wish I had never been Alessa's sister...

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_BOSS_000_CUT_000_180.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_BOSS_000_CUT_000_180.text:
Nothing's going to come from you denying the
past like that. All we can do is face the reality
that's in front of us—'cause it's just you, me,
and Master now!

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_BOSS_000_CUT_000_190.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_BOSS_000_CUT_000_190.text:
Master, can you get in touch with the
people we met at the triangle engines?

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_BOSS_000_CUT_000_200.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_BOSS_000_CUT_000_200.text:
Yes, I can open a line to all
of them simultaneously.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_BOSS_000_CUT_000_210.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_BOSS_000_CUT_000_210.text:
Perfect. Then you and Corana find out
how to cut off the triangle network.
Meanwhile, I've got a cocky little
goddess I need to spank.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_BOSS_000_CUT_000_220.speaker: Corana_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_BOSS_000_CUT_000_220.text:
How can you just move forward
like this!? I just... I...

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_BOSS_000_CUT_000_230.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_BOSS_000_CUT_000_230.text:
Time passes no matter what we do or don't do.
Time makes all things equal—and it's no magic.
And since that's the case, I don't want to
stand still even for a second. Also, the green line seems to expect me
to keep moving forward, so there's that.
Now come on! Let's do this!

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_BOSS_000_CUT_010_040.speaker: Alessa_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_BOSS_000_CUT_010_040.text:
We had a dream when we saw the Vermillion
Bird, Corana... And though it didn't come
true today, maybe someday...it...

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_BOSS_000_CUT_030_000.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_BOSS_000_CUT_030_000.text:
Hey, so won't this all happen again
if the triangle network is rebuilt?

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_BOSS_000_CUT_030_010.speaker: Corana_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_BOSS_000_CUT_030_010.text:
Perhaps—which is why I've decided
to divide the network into smaller
clusters instead. While this will prevent triangle energy from
becoming too concentrated in one place, each
cluster will also serve to complement the
others and help keep everything in check.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_BOSS_000_CUT_030_020.speaker: Amaya_Aisling

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_BOSS_000_CUT_030_030.speaker: Corana_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_BOSS_000_CUT_030_030.text:
I am a scientist.
I prioritize data over emotion.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_BOSS_000_CUT_030_040.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_BOSS_000_CUT_030_040.text:
Well, I'm no scientist, but I totally
get prioritizing the future of the
world over your own feelings.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_BOSS_000_CUT_030_060.speaker: Michele
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_BOSS_000_CUT_030_060.text: Let me help you, Corana. Please.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_BOSS_000_CUT_030_070.speaker: Corana_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_BOSS_000_CUT_030_070.text:
Michele? Of course you can help!
And, um... Thank you.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_BOSS_000_CUT_030_080.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_BOSS_000_CUT_030_080.text:
And what of your magical feline?
Don't you have to find it?

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_BOSS_000_CUT_030_090.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_BOSS_000_CUT_030_090.text:
I found it during the fight with Alessa,
actually—just like the green line said.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_BOSS_000_CUT_030_100.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_BOSS_000_CUT_030_100.text:
It is difficult to reconcile a green line
that only you can see. But your words are
persuasive, so I will choose to believe you.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_BOSS_000_CUT_030_110.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_BOSS_000_CUT_030_110.text:
I'm really happy you trust me, Master,
but it's time for me to say goodbye
to this world. Oh, but before I go,
what is this place even called?

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_BOSS_000_CUT_030_120.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_BOSS_000_CUT_030_120.text:
This world is known as Vermiglio.
I do not know what it means.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_BOSS_010_CUT_000_020.speaker: CEO_TRIGON
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_BOSS_010_CUT_000_020.text:
This is a ceremony for you, Dr. Sitrix,
so I hope you enjoy yourself. That said,
why are you mingling with one of our
employees? Looking for a new assistant?

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_BOSS_010_CUT_000_030.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_BOSS_010_CUT_000_030.text:
She thinks I work for her again.
It's scary how blinded some people
can be to their assumptions.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_BOSS_010_CUT_000_040.speaker: CEO_TRIGON
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_BOSS_010_CUT_000_040.text:
Now then, Dr. Alessa Sitrix will be arriving
momentarily, and I suspect it will be a moving
reunion of sisters long-parted. As such, I'll
give you a little time to say your goodbyes.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_BOSS_010_CUT_000_060.speaker: Alessa_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_BOSS_010_CUT_000_060.text:
Oh, my dear little sister. You have my thanks
for continuing our research after the accident—
for had you not gone and completed the triangle
network, I wouldn't be standing here today.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_BOSS_010_CUT_000_070.speaker: Corana_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_BOSS_010_CUT_000_070.text:
I don't understand. Are you...Alessa?
I mean, I'm happy you're alive—truly I am—
but I'm also very confused. What's going on,
and what did she mean by 'saying goodbyes'?

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_BOSS_010_CUT_000_080.speaker: CEO_TRIGON
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_BOSS_010_CUT_000_080.text:
I fear your sister's role ends here.
With the triangle network completed,
I need her to die for real this time.
...Fred? If you would?

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_BOSS_010_CUT_000_090.speaker: Alessa_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_BOSS_010_CUT_000_090.text:
Fred, no! The director betrayed me!
She intends to keep all this power
for herself! Get rid of her!

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_BOSS_010_CUT_000_100.speaker: Fred_Kinlei
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_BOSS_010_CUT_000_100.text:
Oh, now THIS is rich! Two beautiful—yet
utterly terrifying—women have made the
same request of me! Must be my punishment
for being so darned handsome.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_BOSS_010_CUT_000_110.speaker: Fred_Kinlei
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_BOSS_010_CUT_000_110.text:
Oh, Corana, my former flame. Though you're
rather plain, you're smart as a whip—so I trust
you to make a cool-headed choice here. Who should I choose: the director
or your sister? Who dies?

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_BOSS_010_CUT_000_120.speaker: Corana_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_BOSS_010_CUT_000_120.text: Don't even joke about that, Fred!

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_BOSS_010_CUT_000_130.speaker: Fred_Kinlei
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_BOSS_010_CUT_000_130.text:
Ah ah ah! I know what you're trying to say.
Or rather, I knew what you were going to say
without you even saying it. Alessa may have foisted cleaning up
her research onto me, but she IS
your only sister, after all.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_BOSS_010_CUT_000_140.speaker: Fred_Kinlei
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_BOSS_010_CUT_000_140.text:
Which makes it an obvious choice.
Sorry, Director—I guess you die.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_BOSS_010_CUT_000_150.speaker: CEO_TRIGON
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_BOSS_010_CUT_000_150.text:
You damn, useless drunk! Apparently you
didn't believe me when I said there was
no seat at the table for those who
weren't of use! But so be it. If you can't deal with
Alessa, I'll just do it myself.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_BOSS_010_CUT_000_160.speaker: Fred_Kinlei
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_BOSS_010_CUT_000_160.text:
Hey, you're the one who handed out the
death sentence. And on that note... Bye!

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_BOSS_010_CUT_000_170.speaker: Fred_Kinlei
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_BOSS_010_CUT_000_170.text:
Well, would you look at that?
I'm the director of Trigon now!

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_BOSS_010_CUT_000_180.speaker: Alessa_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_BOSS_010_CUT_000_180.text:
The director is dead, but the plan moves on.
Concentrate the energy from the triangle
network into the central terminal, Fred.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_BOSS_010_CUT_000_190.speaker: Fred_Kinlei
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_BOSS_010_CUT_000_190.text:
That's 'Director,' not 'Fred.' Also,
you don't order me around anymore,
Alessa. The director decides what we're
doing here—and oh gosh, that's ME!

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_BOSS_010_CUT_000_200.speaker: Fred_Kinlei
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_BOSS_010_CUT_000_200.text:
Your eternal life project has, of course,
been canceled. Instead, we'll make a charm
filled with triangle energy and sell it to
customers who crave perpetual youth. And of course, it'll make me RICH!
RICH, I tell ya!

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_BOSS_010_CUT_000_210.speaker: Alessa_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_BOSS_010_CUT_000_210.text: I knew you were useless as an assistant, but I never realized you were so stupid.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_BOSS_010_CUT_000_220.speaker: Fred_Kinlei
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_BOSS_010_CUT_000_220.text:
Well, well! Looks like this day just
earned itself another death sentence! Still, just murdering you outright would be
so BORING, so perhaps I'll try to extract
a little triangle energy out of it!

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_BOSS_010_CUT_000_240.speaker: Fred_Kinlei
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_BOSS_010_CUT_000_240.text:
Dear me, I wonder how long you'll be able to
maintain that form? I mean, you SHOULD show
your sister how brutally disfigured you were 
after the failed experiment, right?

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_BOSS_010_CUT_000_260.speaker: Fred_Kinlei
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_BOSS_010_CUT_000_260.text:
You used triangle theory to evolve yourself
once you saw the success of the BX series.
Sadly, living creatures aren't machines.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_BOSS_010_CUT_000_280.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_BOSS_010_CUT_000_280.text:
So Fred, what do me and Master get after all
the work we did getting the triangle network
up and running? I mean, a little reward seems
appropriate here, don't you think?

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_BOSS_010_CUT_000_290.speaker: Fred_Kinlei
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_BOSS_010_CUT_000_290.text:
Are you still here? Look, just hurry up,
do whatever it is you came here for,
and then be on your way. Oh, and I have a VERY fun date planned
with the Sitrix sisters here, so I'd
advise you not to get in the way.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_BOSS_010_CUT_000_300.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_BOSS_010_CUT_000_300.text: I figured that's what you'd say.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_BOSS_010_CUT_000_310.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_BOSS_010_CUT_000_310.text: Sorry, but I'm in the way!

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_BOSS_010_CUT_000_330.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_BOSS_010_CUT_000_330.text:
Don't get in your way!? You're not NEARLY
cool enough to drop a line like that on me!
...Master! Keep an eye on Corana!

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_BOSS_010_CUT_000_340.speaker: Fred_Kinlei
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_BOSS_010_CUT_000_340.text:
A wise choice.
Oh, and take BX10 with you.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_BOSS_010_CUT_000_370.speaker: Fred_Kinlei
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_BOSS_010_CUT_000_370.text:
...Is that would you thought I'd say?
Ah ha ha! You fell for my stalling technique!
Much like Alessa, I have evolved—and now
my triangle energy is at its full potential!

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_BOSS_010_CUT_010_000.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_BOSS_010_CUT_010_000.text:
I'm not getting the impression you understand
triangle theory at all, Freddy. 'Cause let's be
honest here, you weren't exactly wielding
that power like a pro.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_BOSS_010_CUT_010_010.speaker: Fred_Kinlei
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_BOSS_010_CUT_010_010.text:
I was...drunk? Yes, that's it!
Just a little drunken prank!

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_BOSS_010_CUT_010_020.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_BOSS_010_CUT_010_020.text:
Uh, you MURDERED the director.
You're not getting out of this
without some serious punishment.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_BOSS_010_CUT_010_040.speaker: Corana_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_BOSS_010_CUT_010_040.text:
Alessa, why didn't you tell me you were alive?
I don't care what you look like, because you'll
ALWAYS be my sister. So let's try to find a way
to get you back to normal—together.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_BOSS_010_CUT_010_050.speaker: Alessa_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_BOSS_010_CUT_010_050.text:
You don't have to console me, Corana.
Triangle theory isn't magic—that which has
been broken can't be put back how it was.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_BOSS_010_CUT_010_060.speaker: Corana_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_BOSS_010_CUT_010_060.text:
But there MUST be a way, Alessa.
Don't give up—we'll find it.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_BOSS_010_CUT_010_070.speaker: Alessa_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_BOSS_010_CUT_010_070.text:
I always did tend to give up on things...
But all right, Corana. If you think this
can be done, I'll follow your lead.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_BOSS_010_CUT_010_080.speaker: Corana_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_BOSS_010_CUT_010_080.text:
This is the first time you've taken my advice since we
went to the cave mural! I wish you'd tried listening to
me a lot earlier, but I suppose this will have to do.
Let's see the Vermillion Bird together.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_BOSS_010_CUT_010_090.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_BOSS_010_CUT_010_090.text:
The greatest sisters in the land
are back in action once more.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_BOSS_010_CUT_010_110.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_BOSS_010_CUT_010_110.text:
Actually, I got what I needed while I was
beating up that sad-sack Fred—just like
the green line said I would.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_BOSS_020_CUT_000_020.speaker: CEO_TRIGON
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_BOSS_020_CUT_000_020.text:
Well, if it isn't Dr. Sitrix and
our otherworldly traveler! Sorry I confused you for an employee before, but
I'm SO impressed by how helpful you've been since
you came here—we were at quite the loss for how
to deal with Alessa's Anti-Triangle creatures.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_BOSS_020_CUT_000_040.speaker: CEO_TRIGON
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_BOSS_020_CUT_000_040.text:
Well, I suppose it won't hurt to reveal
my entire clever plan now that the
triangle network is complete...

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_BOSS_020_CUT_000_050.speaker: CEO_TRIGON
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_BOSS_020_CUT_000_050.text:
The Trigon Corporation was created to raise the
funds required to complete the triangle network—
and I cannot tell you how proud I was when
Alessa selected me to lead her new company.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_BOSS_020_CUT_000_060.speaker: CEO_TRIGON
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_BOSS_020_CUT_000_060.text:
But as we approached our goal, Alessa suddenly
wanted to stop the project. Of course, that
would have caused Trigon to collapse—and as
its director, I could not permit such a thing.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_BOSS_020_CUT_000_070.speaker: Corana_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_BOSS_020_CUT_000_070.text:
Hold on. Alessa died in an accident
shortly after the project started.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_BOSS_020_CUT_000_080.speaker: CEO_TRIGON
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_BOSS_020_CUT_000_080.text:
Oh no, Alessa is very much alive;
her 'death' was something she
and Fred came up with. Don't get me wrong—there WAS an accident.
But it didn't kill Alessa.
It just...changed her.

SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_BOSS_020_CUT_000_100.speaker: CEO_TRIGON
SUB_W15_EVAR_AMYA_BOSS_020_CUT_000_100.text:
Details, details! Look, I'm not an expert
in triangle theory, so if you want any
actual technical answers, you'll need to
go straight to your sister. All I know is this: Alessa wanted to complete
the triangle network in order to get her
